name: Boon or Bane
description:
Award or penalize the target, equal to
the spell's bonus power, for their bonus
or defense used in the next check.
Alternatively, you may remove or add
a curse to an item. Discuss the specif-
ics of the curse with your narrator to
determine the spell's cost. To remove a
curse you must expend FP ≥ the original
spell's cost.
